title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu does not display any files between sessions.
EB: The MRU file list in the File menu should display the files that were previously accessed, even after restarting the application.
SR:
1. Open the application and access several files.
2. Close the application.
3. Reopen the application.
4. Check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously accessed files are still displayed.
